participant_2.background:
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I'm a tea enthusiast who loves spending time with my family and friends.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
I enjoy peaceful sports and my bike rides are relaxing.

content.text: Hey, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to ski, go for bike rides, and play video games.
Nice! I love skiing too. I've never been on a bike ride before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun. You should definitely try it sometime!
I will! What kind of video games do you play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I mostly play racing games and RPGs.
I love racing games too! I used to play Mario Kart all the time when I was a kid.
Mario Kart is a classic! I still play it sometimes.
I've been really into Skyrim lately. It's a really big game, but it's so much fun to explore.
I've heard good things about Skyrim. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a great game.
Sounds good! Well, it was nice talking to you. I should probably go get some sleep.
Yeah, me too. I have to wake up early tomorrow for work.
